duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform basic to intermediate-level remittance processing tasks under close supervision.
Operate Mail Extraction Equipment to group work into processible batches.
Open envelopes, extract transactions, batch checks, invoices, and coupons according to client instructions.
Perform a quality review on all outgoing items and prepare outgoing packages for low/medium complexity remittance customers.
Prepare daily reconciliation and billing reports.
Process work accurately and maintain performance output in accordance with client standards.
Perform minor adjustments and minor repairs to job-related equipment.
